# File lib/json/pure/parser.rb, line 70
70:       def parse
71:         reset
72:         obj = nil
73:         until eos?
74:           case
75:           when scan(OBJECT_OPEN)
76:             obj and raise ParserError, "source '#{peek(20)}' not in JSON!"
77:             @current_nesting = 1
78:             obj = parse_object
79:           when scan(ARRAY_OPEN)
80:             obj and raise ParserError, "source '#{peek(20)}' not in JSON!"
81:             @current_nesting = 1
82:             obj = parse_array
83:           when skip(IGNORE)
84:             ;
85:           else
86:             raise ParserError, "source '#{peek(20)}' not in JSON!"
87:           end
88:         end
89:         obj or raise ParserError, "source did not contain any JSON!"
90:         obj
91:       end
